FROM phusion/baseimage:0.9.22

ARG REPOSITORY=stable
ARG JICOFO_VERSION=*

RUN curl -f -LSs https://download.jitsi.org/jitsi-key.gpg.key | apt-key add - && \
    echo "deb https://download.jitsi.org $REPOSITORY/" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/jitsi-$REPOSITORY.list && \
    DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get update -y && \
    DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
        jicofo="$JICOFO_VERSION" && \
    apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

COPY rootfs /

CMD ["/sbin/my_init"]
